name: Deen e Islam
description: Deen-e-Islam an App of website (www.najeebqasmi.com)  Considering the increase in the users of smart-phones, Maulana Dr. Mohammad Najeeb Qasmi has developed first mobile App of the world consisting of different aspects of life (Faith, Worship, Affairs, Ethics and Social) in Urdu, Hindi & English languages, with the help of different people and new technology. This App can be installed on iPhone as well as Android mobiles. About 200 Articles, 100 Lectures and 7 Books will be in your hand after installing this App within 2 minutes and one can use it anywhere either in his hometown or while traveling. After installing this App, one can take benefits of 200 Articles on 21 different topics (Religious and Reformative) without internet, though for listening the Lectures, internet connection is needed.  This app has been develped by using about 21 topics of daily life such as: Tafseer-e-Quran, Hadith-e-Nabawi, Seerat-e-Nabawi, Aqaid, Wozu & Ghusl, Prayer, Ramazan-o-Roza, Zakat-o-Sadaqat, Hajj & Umrah, Family Masail, Human Rights, Ethics, Dealings, History, Islamic Identity, Controversial Masail & Contemporary Masail.   In the lectures simple urdu language has been used so that every person can understand easily.  Facility of Copy-Paste is also a part of this App, it means that one can send whenever he wants to others any part of this App through WhatsApp, SMS, Facebook & e-mail. Search option is also there in this App, it means whatever you want, you can search by typing its one word. Share option is also a part of this App and you can share any part of this App with others. One can get further explanation of any doubt in any article or Masalah by sending a message.  Other then the articles & lectures, all the seven books (A Concise Hajj Guide, Hajj-e-Mabroor, Mukhtasar Hajj-e-Mabroor, Hayya Alas Salah, Islahi Mazaamin, Umrah Ka Tariqah, Tohfa-eRamazan and Maloomat-e-Quran) of Dr. Mohamad Najeeb Qasmi are the part of this app.    (www.najeebqasmi.com)                                (     )        ( )                 Android  iPhone                                                                                                                                                         Copy-Paste               WhatsApp SMS Facebook     Paste           (Search)                         Share                                          (                  )
